EmailTemplate.name: International Product Registration
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
At this time, YETI product registration is not available for international customers. Your online order for a YETI Tundra, Hopper, TANK, Rambler, Panga, or LoadOut is still covered by the YETI Warranty even without registering the cooler online.
Thanks,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
